use_cases_desc:
As part of the user study, participants had to build the following example applications:

- Mail interface
- Media interface
- Maps interface
- Article interface (Wikipedia-like)
- Slides interface
contribution_desc: An end-user tool (XDBrowser) allowing users to adapt existing websites for cross-device interactions. A user study revealed common UI distributions for different types of cross-device user interfaces: maps, slides, media, mail, article.
toolkits: NodeJS; Socket.io; Javascript; jQuery UI; Hammer.js; jQuery Widget Factory
use_cases: E-Mail reader; Media player; Map navigation; Presentation
